data.name: MarsQuest
data.description:
Welcome to Mars!

As premiered at World Expo 2020 (October 2021) in Dubai you and your friends now have the possibility to take your first steps on the surface of planet Mars!

Mars Quest is a "Party Challenge" app, a short experience, recommended for groups between 3 to 15 people.

Now tested and "approved" by no less than four astronauts: Marcos Pontes, Raja "Grinder" Chari, Nora Al Matrooshi and Christer Fuglesang.

You, as an Event Master, need to set up the environment so it becomes fun and safe for your group.
Observe that Mars Quest is a Room Scale experience which uses Hand Tracking and needs 10ft, or 3m, in one direction. We also recommend lowering the Guardian to a minimum (no quick moves).

Comments after the experience:
"Best experience I have had!"
"11 out of 10!"
"I have had many VR-experiences, but this is the best one so far..."

Hashtag #imiteraMarsQuest and @imitera on your social media channels when recording your friends seeing Mars for the first time :-)
